overview: Ashlynn falls asleep masturbating in the tub and dreams of fucking her father. The next day she explains her fantasy to him. When she sees his dick grow, she grabs it and says "Sometimes Dreams Come True Daddy."  Krystal cut through the alley way and found a pendant left hanging for someone to find. What she doesn't know is the pendant is possessed with a spell to bring out the deepest darkest sexual desires of whoever wears it.
title: D Is For Daddy & Dick
